amendment.description: To strike provisions relating to nonprofit entities for the paycheck protection program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1014 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 88.

action.text: Amendment SA 1014 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1242; text: CR S1242) To strike provisions relating to nonprofit entities for the paycheck protection program.
